Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition:
doofus \doo"fus\, n. a person who is stupid or inept; -- used contemptuously. [Also spelled {dufus}.] [Slang]
Syn: dingdong, ding-a-ling. [PJC]
doofus n : a stupid incompetent person [syn: {dimwit}, {nitwit}, {half-wit}]
